.. Bloomberg Manual documentation master file, created by
   sphinx-quickstart on Thu Aug 10 13:43:26 2017.
   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

   
Welcome to Bloomberg Start Manual
=================================

.. image:: image\0.jpg

This is a Guide for Bloomberg Professional. We are focused on:

 * who don't know Bloomberg
 * who want to get financial data
 * who is in MFE, FBMA, or ME program at KAIST

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Getting started

   LogIn

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Modules

   Equity/index
   Fixed_Income/index
   Commodities/index
   Foreign_Exchange/index
   Economics/index

   :maxdepth: 2
   :includehidden:

   mdtest

.. admonition:: References

   The University of Manchester. (2016) `Business & Management Database Guide
   <http://subjects.library.manchester.ac.uk/ld.php?content_id=2285445>`_
   
   The University of Manchester. (2016) `Bloomberg Handout
   <http://subjects.library.manchester.ac.uk/ld.php?content_id=2285434>`_
   
   Yale University Library. (2017) `Getting Started with Bloomberg
   <http://guides.library.yale.edu/Bloomberg/bloomberg_docs>`_
